title: Scribbled letters, chaotic, no serif, no nothing. A blog logo.
content:
Hallo.  
I really need to know what font is this. Its from my friends dessert blog, we're making him a birthday present and it would be awesome if I could make him a card in a similar style. I would ask him what font he used, but it's supposed to be a surprise.

Tried a couple of websides that help with font identification, came up with nothing. You're my only hope ;)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061057im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_3862.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061057/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_56.png) | 15.92 KB |
author: grimvalt

comments.content:
I also found some more worlds written in this font. Apparently the "i" have a strange type of dotting. Maybe this will help in IDing the font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061057im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo2_6078.jpg)
